name: Jumping Jacks
description: A classic cardio warm-up exercise that engages the legs and shoulders while elevating heart rate. Improves coordination and boosts cardiovascular endurance.
modifications: Reduce the intensity by slowing down the pace or performing step jacks instead.
coach_tips: Keep the movements fluid and controlled, and land softly to minimize impact on joints.

name: Arm Circles
description: Dynamic shoulder warm-up exercise involving circular motions with the arms. Enhances shoulder mobility and flexibility.
modifications: Use lighter weights or perform the exercise without weights to reduce intensity.
coach_tips: Maintain a slight bend in the elbows and focus on controlled movements throughout the range of motion.

name: Air Squats
description: Bodyweight squats targeting the lower body muscles. Improves lower body strength, mobility, and stability.
modifications: Reduce the depth of the squat or use a chair for support if needed.
coach_tips: Keep the chest up, knees tracking over the toes, and weight distributed evenly on the feet.

name: Push-ups
description: Classic bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Builds upper body strength and stability.
modifications: Perform push-ups from knees or against an elevated surface to reduce intensity.
coach_tips: Maintain a straight line from head to heels, and engage the core throughout the movement.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Dynamic exercise that mimics climbing motions, engaging the core, shoulders, and legs. Provides a cardiovascular challenge.
modifications: Slow down the pace or perform mountain climbers with hands on an elevated surface.
coach_tips: Keep the hips low and drive the knees towards the chest with each rep, maintaining a steady pace.

name: Burpees
description: Full-body exercise combining a squat, push-up, and jump. Enhances strength, endurance, and cardiovascular fitness.
modifications: Omit the push-up or perform step burpees to reduce intensity.
coach_tips: Focus on maintaining good form throughout each phase of the burpee and aim for explosive jumps.

name: Russian Twists
description: Core exercise involving twisting motions from side to side. Targets the obliques and improves core stability.
modifications: Perform the exercise with feet on the ground for greater stability.
coach_tips: Maintain a straight back and engage the core throughout the movement. Twist from the torso, not just the arms.

name: Walking Lunges
description: Walking lunges engage the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes. Promotes lower body strength, balance, and coordination.
modifications: Perform stationary lunges or use a wall or railing for balance support.
coach_tips: Keep the chest up, shoulders back, and maintain a 90-degree angle in both knees at the bottom of the lunge.

name: Plank
description: Static core exercise that strengthens the abdominal muscles and promotes overall core stability.
modifications: Perform the plank from knees or on forearms for reduced intensity.
coach_tips: Keep the body in a straight line from head to heels, and engage the core by drawing the navel towards the spine.

name: Box Jumps
description: Explosive lower body exercise involving jumping onto a box or elevated surface. Develops lower body power, explosiveness, and coordination.
modifications: Use a lower box height or perform step-ups onto the box to reduce intensity.
coach_tips: Land softly on the box with knees tracking over toes, and fully extend hips at the top of the jump.

name: High Knees
description: Dynamic exercise involving rapidly raising knees towards the chest. Engages leg muscles and boosts cardiovascular endurance.
modifications: Reduce the pace or perform marching in place.
coach_tips: Maintain an upright posture and pump the arms in rhythm with the knees.

name: Push-up to Downward Dog
description: Combination exercise involving a push-up followed by transitioning into a downward dog yoga pose. Strengthens upper body and improves flexibility.
modifications: Perform push-ups from knees or perform a push-up followed by a standing forward fold instead of downward dog.
coach_tips: Focus on smooth transitions between each phase of the movement and maintain a strong core throughout.

name: Medicine Ball Cleans
description: Explosive full-body exercise involving lifting a medicine ball from the ground to the chest in one fluid motion. Develops power and coordination.
modifications: Use a lighter medicine ball or perform air squats with explosive jumps instead.
coach_tips: Keep the chest up, drive through the heels, and use the momentum generated by the legs to propel the medicine ball.

name: Lateral Lunges
description: Lunge variation involving stepping sideways, targeting the inner and outer thighs. Improves lower body strength and mobility.
modifications: Perform shallow lunges or use a support for balance.
coach_tips: Keep the chest up, shift weight onto the heel of the lunging leg, and maintain a neutral spine throughout.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Shoulder-strengthening exercise involving pressing dumbbells overhead. Targets the deltoid muscles and triceps.
modifications: Use lighter weights or perform the exercise seated for stability.
coach_tips: Maintain a slight bend in the knees, and avoid overarching the lower back during the movement.

name: Box Step-ups
description: Lower body exercise involving stepping onto a box or bench. Builds lower body strength and stability.
modifications: Use a lower box height or perform step-ups without weights.
coach_tips: Drive through the heel of the stepping leg and fully extend the hip at the top of the movement.

name: Plank with Shoulder Taps
description: Core-stabilizing exercise involving alternating taps of the shoulders while maintaining a plank position. Strengthens core and shoulders.
modifications: Perform the exercise from knees or reduce the number of taps.
coach_tips: Maintain a stable plank position with hips level throughout the movement and minimize rotation of the torso.

name: Jumping Lunges
description: Dynamic lower body exercise involving alternating lunges with explosive jumps. Builds leg strength and power.
modifications: Perform alternating reverse lunges or reduce the depth of the lunge.
coach_tips: Land softly with both knees bent at 90-degree angles and maintain an upright torso throughout the movement.

name: Dead Bugs
description: Core exercise involving lying on the back and extending opposite arm and leg away from each other. Improves core stability and control.
modifications: Reduce the range of motion or perform the exercise with bent knees.
coach_tips: Keep the lower back pressed into the ground and engage the core to prevent arching.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Static core exercise involving lying on the back and lifting the legs and shoulders off the ground. Strengthens the entire core.
modifications: Bend the knees or perform the exercise with arms resting by the sides for support.
coach_tips: Focus on pressing the lower back into the ground and maintaining tension throughout the entire body.

name: Leg Swings (Front to Back)
description: Stand tall and swing one leg forward and backward, keeping it straight. Engages the hamstrings and quadriceps while improving hip mobility.
modifications: Perform smaller swings or hold onto a stable surface for balance support.
coach_tips: Maintain a slight bend in the standing leg and focus on controlled movements.

name: Arm Circles
description: Extend your arms to the sides and make circular motions with them, gradually increasing the size of the circles. Improves shoulder mobility and flexibility.
modifications: Perform arm circles with smaller range of motion or use lighter weights for resistance.
coach_tips: Keep the shoulders relaxed and avoid shrugging. Focus on smooth, controlled movements.

name: Walking Lunges with Twist
description: Perform walking lunges while twisting your torso towards the front leg with each step. Stretches the hip flexors, quadriceps, and thoracic spine.
modifications: Perform stationary lunges with a twist if space is limited.
coach_tips: Keep the knees aligned with the toes and maintain an upright posture while twisting the torso.

name: Inchworms
description: Start in a standing position, bend forward at the hips, and walk your hands forward into a plank position. Walk your feet towards your hands, keeping legs straight. Reverse the movement to return to the starting position. Stretches hamstrings, calves, and shoulders.
modifications: Perform inchworms with bent knees if flexibility is limited.
coach_tips: Engage the core throughout the movement and focus on maintaining a straight back.

name: Hip Circles
description: Stand with feet hip-width apart and hands on hips. Rotate hips in circular motion, gradually increasing the size of circles. Improves hip mobility and flexibility.
modifications: Perform smaller circles or hold onto a stable surface for balance.
coach_tips: Keep the movement controlled and avoid arching the lower back.

name: Dynamic Chest Stretch
description: Interlace fingers behind your back, straighten arms, and lift them slightly away from your body. Rotate arms to one side, then the other, keeping them straight. Stretches chest and shoulders.
modifications: Perform the stretch with arms at a lower height if shoulder flexibility is limited.
coach_tips: Maintain a strong core and avoid overarching the lower back during the stretch.

name: High Kicks
description: Stand tall and kick one leg straight up in front of you while keeping it straight. Engages the hamstrings and stretches the hip flexors.
modifications: Perform kicks with a smaller range of motion or reduce the height of the kick.
coach_tips: Keep the supporting leg straight and maintain a tall posture throughout the movement.

name: Dynamic Seated Forward Fold
description: Sit on the floor with legs extended in front of you. Inhale and reach arms overhead, then exhale and fold forward, reaching towards toes. Inhale to sit back up. Stretches hamstrings, calves, and lower back.
modifications: Perform the exercise with knees slightly bent if hamstring flexibility is limited.
coach_tips: Maintain a straight back and avoid rounding the spine during the forward fold.

name: Side Leg Swings
description: Stand beside a wall or sturdy object for balance support. Swing one leg sideways in front of the body, then swing it back across the body. Stretches adductors and improves hip mobility.
modifications: Perform smaller swings or reduce the range of motion if hip flexibility is limited.
coach_tips: Keep the swinging leg straight and maintain a stable torso throughout the movement.

name: Dynamic Calf Stretch
description: Stand with one foot forward and the other foot back, keeping both feet flat on the ground. Bend front knee while keeping back leg straight, feeling the stretch in the calf of the back leg. Switch legs and repeat. Stretches calves.
modifications: Perform the stretch with both knees slightly bent if flexibility is limited.
coach_tips: Keep the heel of the back foot pressed into the ground to maximize the stretch.
